message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I really think that's the lowest I can go.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're willing to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking I could do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $95. I'm willing to meet you at $92.50, but that's as high as I can go.

I understand you're willing to meet me at $92.50, Bob, but I'm still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise further and sell it to you for $96.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $96.50. I'm willing to meet you at $90, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to sell it to me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $96.50 and $90, which would be $93.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $93.50. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that I might not be able to get a better deal elsewhere.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $92. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $93.50 and $92, which would be $92.75. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to pay $92.75. I'm willing to meet you at $92, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to sell it to me at that price, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $120.
